Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory102.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Alright. Commandant, Liv, get into position.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "What's the big idea! Who ran into me! I'm gonna saw you in half!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Am I... Am I too late?! For... For the...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Picture...! Did I make it in time?!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "You made it just in time. Had you not run into Nanami and made her take out her chainsaw, we would've already taken the group photo...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Phew!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What are you doing...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...Huh? Isn't it a group photo? Are you gonna make me do all this hard work for nothing?!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Wait... Nanami—Huh? What are you doing?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Tehe! I wanna picture, too!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Well... I guess there's no turning back now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'This works too.', 3: '33', 4: "Let's all take a photo together.", 5: '33'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I guess there's no other choice, but the cabin's too crowded. Let's take the photo outside. It's finally snowing.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hey! Quit pushing me!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Put your chainsaw away, Nanami. You'll hurt the commandant...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Scooch over, Liv. You're in the way! I won't be in the photo!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Everyone ready?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Wait! What about Lucia?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Wait! I heard a noise coming from the chimney.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Everyone, you're the best!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgsd001.jpg'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hehehe! Livy! Liv!'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Sigh... Careful, Nanami. You're going to fall..."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Well... Looks there were too many people. The commandant got pushed out of frame...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Want to take another?'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Let's take another one... After all, a precious occasion like this is hard to come by!"}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "It's just a silly group photo. Who cares if the commandant's in it? I know I don't...! But if you insist..."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '(Sobs) You guys made me look hideous! I wanna take another one!'}
{2: 'You pushed me completely...', 3: '73', 4: 'I demand a reshoot...!', 5: '73'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Oh, no. There's no more film left in the camera. That was the last one..."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'How about we give it to the commandant as a gift from everyone!'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Good idea, Lucia. It's too bad, but I'm really happy with how everyone's work paid off."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The snowy sky, the howling wind, the dazzling fireworks—I couldn't have asked for a better Christmas this year."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Thank you so much for today, everyone! I'm super, super happy!"}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Wait, Liv. There's something even more important."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Huh? Something even more important?'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Lucia's right. Since the group photo turned out to be a gift from everyone to the commandant, you still need to give a gift."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Oh, you're right..."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I know! I know! Liv has been secretly researching M.I.—'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Nanami!! My gift to the commandant is—'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "—Isn't ready yet!"}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "This is my first Christmas gift to the commandant. I need to make sure it's perfect. I hope you'll like it."}
{2: 'I look forward to it.', 3: '87'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Alright then. Looks like Operation Christmas is finally complete.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'd say it when perfectly—aside from a few bumps along the way.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "...Well, for me... All I got to do was spend Christmas with Corrupted outside in the freezing wind...! I don't want another Christmas like this ever again!", 4: '1'}
